DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety reactogenicity Synflorix™ ( GSK 1024850A ) give 3-dose primary immunization course co-administered Infanrix hexa™ vaccine 2 , 3 4 month age infant Vietnam .
DOC.brief_title: Primary Vaccination Study With GSK Biologicals ' Pneumococcal Vaccine Healthy Infants Vietnam
